items.question: Can I use my own branding and design elements?
items.answer: Absolutely! Upload your logo, brand colors, fonts, and images to create invitations that perfectly match your brand identity.

items.question: How many invitations can I send?
items.answer: Our plans include generous sending limits, from 1,000 invitations per month on our Starter plan to unlimited sending on Enterprise plans.

items.question: Can guests RSVP directly from the invitation?
items.answer: Yes! Every invitation includes customizable RSVP buttons that link directly to your registration page or built-in RSVP forms.

items.question: Do you support multiple languages?
items.answer: Yes, you can create invitations in multiple languages and even send different language versions to different guest segments.
